episodes.title: Charles Mills Manson- Scramblehead
episodes.description: This week we take a journey to Spahn ranch and all the love peace and gonorrhea you can handle! From there Jeff discusses the families trip to the desert, and how Charlie came up with the bottomless pit Armageddon prophecy, (hint: it’s craziness) and then how one of the greatest rock albums in history unintentionally led to many horrific murders, this and more on this weeks episode . Thank you back home media Derek releford and Brandon smith for this episode.

episodes.title: Charles Mills Manson Cease to Exist
episodes.description: Welcome back to the insanity of the history of the Manson family. This week we look into the time Charlie and co spend at with Dennis Wilson hobnobbing with Hollywood elites who then deny ever meeting him a few years later. Please listen and share podcast available on all major platforms

episodes.title: Charles Mills Manson I Am The God Of F***
episodes.description: This episode we get crazy deep into the weeds of the formation of the Manson family. How did this narcissistic violent man form a hippie love cult during the summer of love you’ll have to listen to find out not saying it was all the CIA but you never know….listen on Spotify Apple spreaker and audible podcasts or wherever fine podcasts are sold jk it’s free you cheapos…thank you

episodes.title: Charles Mills Manson the Beginning
episodes.description: Alright well we are finally here! This week, Jeff gets into the story of Charlie Mills Manson, where he came from how he was raised and how he became who he became this is a great episode for anyone who is into studying psychological or sociological characteristics, true crime fans or anyone who wants to know what makes us tick? Come start the journey today thank you to Brandon Smith for editing this show and the other fine shows on BHM. Please like share and most important….enjoy! Reach me on Facebook or theindependeninfidel@gmail.com thank you!

episodes.title: The Cult With No Name- The Modern Make Up
episodes.description: Jeff talks about the modern 2x2 in part 3 of the series.

episodes.title: Cult With No Name The History
episodes.description: Fascinated about unsolved mysteries? Tune into our next audio series episode of "Cult with no name- the history edited clarity" and discover the uncovered stories of unconventional religious movements. Do the unheard tales match the truths you know? uch as #HistoryPodcast #CultHistory #RealStories, etc.

episodes.title: 2X2 Bonus Episode (call with producer)
episodes.description: Behind the Scenes: Unpacking 'Independent Infidel' & The 2x2sThe hosts discuss the responses and pushback to the first episode of 'Independent Infidel', which explores the obscure religious group known as the 2x2s. They talk about their motivations to cover a secret cult, the mixed experiences with the group's members, and the necessity of presenting multiple sides of the story rather than demonizing a particular group. The discussion also touches on the importance of faith in society and the challenges in leaving a group one has been with their whole life. They also express their intention to give the 2x2s a rightful representation, involving community feedback in crafting future episodes to ensure accuracy.00:00 Introduction and Casual Conversation00:12 Discussion on Healthy Eating and Lifestyle01:23 Reflections on Personal Growth and Change01:37 Exploring Controversies and Misunderstandings03:57 Deeper Dive into the 2x2 Church04:55 Understanding the Role of Workers in the Church06:04 Exploring the Concept of Salvation in the Church06:56 Critique of Power Dynamics in Religious Groups08:16 Personal Reflections on Faith and Religion10:46 Discussion on the Impact of Church Practices13:11 Exploring the Role of Workers in the Church: A Second Look16:20 Reflections on the Impact of Religion on Society22:40 Final Thoughts and Future Plans

episodes.title: The Cult With No Name
